channel.title: Peter Green on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Peter Green on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Fleetwood Mac Co-Founder Peter Green’s Publishing, Recordings Assets Acquired by Primary Wave
item.description: Indie publisher Primary Wave Music has struck a deal with the Fleetwood Mac co-founder Peter Green‘s estate to purchase assets of the English artist’s Green’s Rattlesnake music publishing

item.title: Fleetwood Mac Co-Founder Peter Green’s Publishing, Recordings Assets Acquired by Primary Wave
item.description: Indie publisher Primary Wave Music has struck a deal with the Fleetwood Mac co-founder Peter Green‘s estate to purchase assets of the English artist’s Green’s Rattlesnake music publishing
